data.name: Chicken Fall: Prologue
data.detailed_description:
Add to wishlist plz ! ! !

The full version will unlock threat level caps, more scenarios, weapons, props and enemies! A new style of tactical pixel horizontal shooter Roguelike experience is about to begin! Please add the full version to your wishlist! Thanks for your support!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1707220


About the Game

Follow Us
Follow our official community at：
Discord: Bento Duck Games

Have you forgotten how to fight after being absent from the battlefield for so long? In the prologue, lead your chickens to re-familiarise themselves with the sensation of battle! The full version of EA will be available soon, so keep an eye on the wishlist!!!

  • The threat level cap for the prologue is locked at 8, the full version will not limit the threat level.
  • More weapons, defenses, and novelty items will be unlocked.
  • More scenarios, storylines, and enemies will be unlocked.
  • Multiplayer mode will be included (in development...)

Game Overview

Chicken Fall: Prologue is a pixelated tactical strategy + horizontal shooting Roguelike game. The game was created by one person with an independent liver.
In the game, the player controls the protagonist, Chicken Boss, and defeats a band of various carnivores in the forest with the help of his friends.
The overall game style is light-hearted and witty, and thrilling.

Elements randomly generated

  • In the game, the map is different each time the player enters a level, and each time the map is assembled with random resources.
  • Enemies in the map are randomly generated based on rules such as the current threat level.
  • The strength of the enemies also changes with the threat level.
  • The location of resources such as treasure chests in the map are also randomly generated.

Tactical Strategy

Pre-battle preparation is very important! What props you choose to enter the battlefield will have a bearing on whether or not the battle goes well.
During the battle, the use of resources and the choice of resources is also a major challenge for players.
Players can call for support in battle, including resource drops and paratroopers, by setting drop locations and adjusting tactics to gain an advantage in battle.
When facing multiple enemies at once, recklessness can lead to defeat, so battle strategy becomes important and players will need to use a variety of props and skills to defeat them.

data.short_description: You'll take on the role of the game's protagonist, Chicken Boss, and with the help of your friends, you'll hone your fighting skills, learn to use props, adapt to the tense and exciting battlefield, and prepare to defeat a forest bandit of all kinds of predators later!
